column402: chlorphenesin. note: the activator contains 2% pure ghk (tripeptide-1). the serum bottle
column405: 1% ghk is left in free form
column406: while 1% binds to the copper gluconate to form 1% copper tripeptide-1 (known as ghk-cu or copper peptides). the "2:1" reference in the name of this product reflects the 2-to-1 ratio of ghk to ghk-cu
